attributes.action: abolish local government in favour of national bodies to deliver the same service standards throughout England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils are about amateur politicians, do gooders, jobs worths, red tape and inconsistency. A national agency say delivering education could minimise back office costs and concentrate on good equal standards. Would work for highways, environmental health, planning, social services etc etc. Housing should become an RSL function by compulsion.Leisure provision etc should be with local trusts
